name: Old Kaiju Tape
description:
Please play in fullscreen

I think controller does not work on web browser

Instructions

Arrow keys/Right joystick to move the small robot

Right shift/Right trigger close to a big robot to connect to it

Spacebar/Right Trigger to jump, when disconnected, and charge forward, when connected

WASD/Left stick to control the connected big robot. Dont go too far, or you will disconect

Left shift/Left trigger to make a big robot interact with an object with the same color

Purple robot: Hold Action button to carry a box. Use it to jump higher

Blue robot: Press action button and the correct sequence of buttons showed on screen (Q or E in keyboard, RB and RT in controller)  to open the door

Orange robot: Hold action button and make circles with the left joystick (or push W A S D in sequence) to make the elevator go up and down

When you are connected to a big robot, defense sistems will go for them. Intercept them with the small robot

Use any big robot to open the door at the end of the level holding the action button

Get the small robot to the end of the level
